patthana3.12:6.1: Nokilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:7.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:9.1: Kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:10.1: Nokilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:11.1: Kilesaṃ akusalañca nokilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:12.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.
patthana3.12:13.1: Kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.12:13.2: vicikicchaṃ paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccaṃ paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana3.12:14.1: Nokilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.12:14.2: vicikicchāsahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. #1
patthana3.12:15.1: Kilesaṃ akusalañca nokilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayā—
patthana3.12:15.2: vicikicchāsahagate khandhe ca vicikicchañca paṭicca vicikicchāsahagato moho, uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca uddhaccañca paṭicca uddhaccasahagato moho.
patthana3.12:16.1: Nahetuyā tīṇi, naadhipatiyā nava, napurejāte nava, napacchājāte nava, naāsevane nava, nakamme tīṇi, navipāke nava, navippayutte nava.
patthana3.12:17.1: Kileso akusalo dhammo kilesassa akusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo.
patthana3.12:18.1: Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe nava, adhipatiyā nava (majjhe tīṇi sahajātādhipati), anantare nava, samanantare nava … pe … upanissaye nava, āsevane nava, kamme tīṇi, āhāre tīṇi, indriye tīṇi, jhāne tīṇi, magge nava, sampayutte nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.12:19.1: Nokilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nokileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:20.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:24.1: Saṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.12:25.1: Asaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:26.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.12:27.1: Saṃkilesikaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:28.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:30.1: Saṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.12:31.1: Asaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:32.1: Saṃkilesikaṃ abyākatañca asaṃkilesikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:33.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.12:33.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi … pe … pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:37.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:38.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:40.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:41.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:43.1: Asaṃkiliṭṭhaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca asaṃkiliṭṭho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:44.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:49.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:50.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:52.1: Kilesasampayuttaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesasampayutto akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:53.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:55.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:56.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:61.1: Saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:62.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:64.1: Kilesañceva saṃkilesikañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:65.1: Saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:66.1: Kilesañceva saṃkilesikaṃ akusalañca saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkilesiko ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:67.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.12:67.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ, kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi … pe … pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:68.1: Saṃkilesikañceva no ca kilesaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkilesiko ceva no ca kileso abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:69.1: Hetuyā ekaṃ, ārammaṇe ekaṃ … pe … avigate ekaṃ.
patthana3.12:74.1: Kilesañceva saṃkiliṭṭhañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:75.1: Saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saṃkiliṭṭho ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:76.1: Kilesañceva saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ akusalañca saṃkiliṭṭhañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva saṃkiliṭṭho ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:77.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.12:77.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārampi … pe … pañhāvārampi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:81.1: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttañca akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:82.1: Kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesasampayutto ceva no ca kileso akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:83.1: Kilesañceva kilesasampayuttaṃ akusalañca kilesasampayuttañceva no ca kilesaṃ akusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kileso ceva kilesasampayutto ca akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:84.1: Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe nava … pe … avigate nava.
patthana3.12:84.4: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Kilesadukaakusalasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi … pe … pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
patthana3.12:88.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.12:89.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṃkilesiko kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:90.1: Hetuyā dve, ārammaṇe dve … pe … avigate dve.
patthana3.12:91.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #1
patthana3.12:92.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ abyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto asaṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana3.12:93.1: Kilesavippayuttaṃ saṃkilesikaṃ abyākatañca kilesavippayuttaṃ asaṃkilesikaṃ abyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca kilesavippayutto saṃkilesiko abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana3.12:94.1: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve … pe … āsevane ekaṃ … pe … avigate pañca.
patthana3.12:94.6: (Saṃkhittaṃ. Lokiyadukaabyākatasadisaṃ. Sahajātavārepi … pe … pañhāvārepi sabbattha vitthāretabbaṃ.)
